Resurrecting the app after the BGG 2.0 update.  Currently, everything seems stable.  However, the following bugs have been introduced:

exact search is broken
search results appear to display in a strange order
yearpublished is missing from search
age is missing from game listing
description may not need to be processed as much as when it was html
images and thumbnails are not functional

fixed a few issues with orientation change - notably, the view is not loaded until the game information is downloaded, and the orientation change will not invoke a new view until then in order to prevent crashing

- Fixed NPE by checking for it with polls that don't have the 'players' String.
- CreatePollsGroup now returns the correct position for newly created polls.
- Changed observer to only watch main URI and not descendants.  This should make polls tab use less processing, but will not have a 'live' update, instead having to wait till all is loaded.

- Changed createPollGroup to use mGroupData instead of incorrectly using mChildData to get position.
- Added check to see if file in cache exists to stop FileNotFoundException in getDrawableFromCache.
